fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services

1.  DIRECTIVE (EU) 2016/2341 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL 
of 14 December 2016 
on the activities and supervision of institutions for occupational retirement provision (IORPs) 
(recast) 
2. Capital Markets Union;  
3. Proposal for a Council Directive implementing enhanced cooperation in the area of financial transaction tax COM(2013)71; 
4. Regulation (EU) No 648/2012 (EMIR). 
5. Personal Pensions 
6. CRR 
7. Sustainable Finance 
8. Fintech 
9. European Supervision
organisation_name: Pensioenfederatie (Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds) (PF)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: At European level, the Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds is a member of the AEIP (European Association of Paritarian Institutions of Social Protection) and of PensionsEurope.
goals__remit:
On behalf of its members, the Federation of the Dutch Pension funds promotes the further development, maintenance and the provision of a 2nd pillar pension system that is based on high quality and trust. 
 
The members of the Federation jointly support these values. They service and act on behalf of millions of active and dormant participants who are the focus of the endeavor of our members.
